title: Ticket #4823: Advertise submit requirements
description:
We don't currently tell anyone what a schedd's submit requirements are. In addition to improving user-friendliness, adding them to the schedd's ad should further simplify the requirements code; it also makes a condor_q enhancement possible, where a user could supply a submit file and find out what, exactly, about the resulting job ad the schedd in question doesn't like.

We should advertise each named submit requirement in its own attribute, and and a SubmitRequirements attribute which references them.
